main event: A white light, larger than a star, was observed in the sky, showing characteristics similar to a meteor.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5-10 seconds., The object was observed while climbing and made no sound., The light appeared to flick out suddenly., Multiple conclusions were drawn, including it possibly being a balloon or aircraft., The sighting was noted by air traffic control personnel at Travis AFB.
witness description: personnel from the 1951 AACS Squadron and 5th Weather Squadron
